Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Connective Tissue Diseases/Cartilage Diseases/Tracheobronchomalacia/Tracheomalacia
Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Congenital Abnormalities/Musculoskeletal Abnormalities/Tracheobronchomalacia/Tracheomalacia
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: A congenital or acquired condition of underdeveloped or degeneration of CARTILAGE in the TRACHEA. This results in a floppy tracheal wall making patency difficult to maintain. It is characterized by wheezing and difficult breathing.
